subject: AM Brief: Fri, 30 Jun 2023
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was mixed. Base metals were volatile amid concerns over Tanzanian Shilling.

**Key Event Today:** China PMI at 14:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Frami, Murazik and Franecki downgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Ara aro nesciunt adflicto auctor amplexus molestiae textus.
- AFR: Depereo sollers alienus bibo civitas arguo.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Follow-up: Smitham - Marquardt performance report
body:
Hi Thomas,

Good to connect with you last week.

I'm following up on the performance report. We require an update by EOD Thursday for our trustees.

Could you please provide a status update?

Kind regards,
Sunsuper Investments Team

--
Sunsuper Investments Team
Queensland, Australia

subject: Incident: Degraded Performance - Market Data Feed
body:
Dear Users,

We are investigating reports of degraded performance affecting the Market Data Feed. Our engineers are actively working on mitigation. Next update in 30 minutes.

--
J.P. Morgan Technology - APAC
This is an automated message. Do not reply.
For support, please contact the IT Service Desk.

subject: Your J.P. Morgan Payslip is Available
body:
Dear Thomas Francis,

Your payslip for June 2023 is now available online. Due to the public holiday, payment will be processed a day early this period.

To view your payslip, please log in to the Employee Portal.

--
J.P. Morgan Payroll - Australia
This is an automated notification. Please do not reply.
For inquiries, please contact HR Services.

subject: URGENT: Portfolio Adjustment for Sunsuper
body:
Thomas -

Client instruction just came down. We need to liquidate the the USD exposure.

Please drop everything and model out the implications. I need execution levels and a full impact analysis on my desk in 2 hours.

Sarah Connor

--
Sarah Connor
Managing Director, Portfolio Manager
J.P. Morgan Asset Management
Sydney, Australia
Tel: +61 2 9003 8888

subject: Building Update: Scheduled Fire Drill
body:
Dear Occupants,

A scheduled fire drill will be conducted this Monday morning between 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM. All building employees must participate.

Please follow instructions from your floor wardens. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Kind regards,
Nathan Wright
